<title level="1" right="Cantrip 1" pfs="Standard">[Haunting Hymn](/Spells.aspx?ID=924)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Cantrip" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=22" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 109 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** Fortitude

</row>

</column>

---

You echo a jarring hymn that only creatures in the area can hear. The hymn deals sonic damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier, with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save. If a target critically fails the save, it's also [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d6.
name: Haunting Hymn
